features.name: Multi-Agent Debate System
features.description: LangGraph-based orchestration system with Pro/Con Debater, Fact-Checker, Judge, Moderator, and Topic Generator agents for conducting adversarial debates between LLM models

features.name: LLM Provider Integration
features.description: Unified client for multiple LLM providers with streaming support, token counting, cost tracking, and retry logic

features.name: Debate Engine
features.description: Core debate lifecycle management with state persistence, checkpoints, recovery, and transcript management

features.name: Dual Rating System
features.description: Glicko-2 algorithm implementation for dual scoring (Crowd Elo + AI Quality), Charismatic Liar Index, and controversy detection

features.name: Prediction Market
features.description: Virtual currency betting system with DebatePoints, dynamic odds calculation, payout system, and Superforecaster badges

features.name: Database Schema & ORM
features.description: Neon PostgreSQL database with Drizzle ORM, including schemas for debates, models, personas, topics, votes, bets, and ratings

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Neon Auth (Stack Auth) integration with session management, OAuth support, and anonymous voting

features.name: Security & Abuse Prevention
features.description: IP-based rate limiting, session fingerprinting, anomalous voting detection, cost monitoring, and spending caps

features.name: Caching System
features.description: Upstash Redis integration for caching frequently accessed data and reducing database queries

features.name: Performance Optimization
features.description: Code splitting, lazy loading, monitoring utilities, and performance tracking

features.name: Debate Configuration Form
features.description: UI for creating new debates with model selection, topic selection, persona assignment, and parameter configuration

features.name: Debate Viewer & Orchestrator
features.description: Real-time debate viewing with streaming responses, RCR phase display, fact-check badges, and voting interface

features.name: Leaderboard System
features.description: Dual score display (Crowd + AI), multiple sorting options, model detail pages, per-topic performance, and controversy highlighting

features.name: Statistics Dashboard
features.description: Aggregate platform metrics, trends, and visualizations for overall platform performance

features.name: Topic Management
features.description: Topic submission, admin approval workflow, auto-replenishment system, and topic categorization

features.name: User Dashboard
features.description: Personal statistics, voting history, prediction accuracy, DebatePoints balance, and Superforecaster badges

features.name: Social Sharing
features.description: Social media share buttons, Open Graph metadata, and debate sharing functionality

features.name: Probability Visualization
features.description: Live probability graphs for prediction market odds and betting trends

features.name: Theme System
features.description: Dark/light mode toggle with system preference detection and persistence

features.name: UI Component Library
features.description: Reusable WCAG 2.1 AA compliant components including Button, Card, Badge, Alert, Tabs, Toast, Skeleton, LoadingSpinner, Navigation, Breadcrumbs, Container, PageTransition

features.name: API Endpoints
features.description: RESTful API routes for debate management, voting, leaderboard, statistics, predictions, topics, and health checks

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Landing page with project overview, animations, and navigation to key features

features.name: Component Showcase
features.description: Development page showcasing all UI components with examples and documentation

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Global error boundaries and error pages with recovery options

features.name: Loading States
features.description: Loading indicators and skeleton screens for async operations
